text: Lindauer may refer to: * Lindauer (surname) * Lindauer Allee (Berlin U-Bahn) * Lindauer (wine), a New Zealand sparkling wine * Lindauer DORNIER GmbH, textile machinery manufacturer located in Lindau, Germany * Lindauer Brothers Company, dealers in men's furnishing goods in Chicago, Illinois * Lindauer (grape), a Swiss wine grape that is also known as Completer * General term for people of the town of Lindau in Bavaria, Germany == See also == * Lindau (disambiguation)
title: Lindauer
